adDetails: Looking for a piano tuner in Peninsula area? Whether you are looking for a piano tuner or a complete rebuilding job, we offer complete piano care and maintenance. Piano tuning, piano repair, action regulation, and voicing are offered. Complete piano care is what we're all about. Pianos are more than a nice piece furniture or 88 keys that produce beautiful music. Pianos have more than 9,000 parts - more than any automobile in existence today and are sensitive to their surroundings. Temperature, relative humidity, climate, as well as the placement of your piano affect its overall condition year round. Having your piano serviced regularly can bring you many years and decades of enjoyment. Feel free to contact us for a free quote for your piano.
